name: Doki Doki: Hot Babes!
description:
A very high quality dating simulator where you get to date 4 hot babes. Despacito Spider, Earthworm Sally, su tart, and ME!! Promise to spend the most time with me o k. im felipe

- Felipe

(This is a sorta parody game of Doki Doki Literature Club.  Doki Doki Literature Club belongs to Team Salvato.)
